content: {"name": "Mazzoni Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Referral from their medical case manager ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mazzonicenter.org/supportive-services/food-bank", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1348 Bainbridge Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Hawthorne", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19147", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.94263460000001, "longitude": -75.1650837}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 563-0652", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "21:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
